New Records: Lionel Messi became the second-highest all-time international men's goalscorer, eclipsing Ali Daei with 109 goals
Key Match Events: Argentina won the semifinal match against Canada 2-0
Lionel Messi scored his first goal of Copa America 2024 in the 51st minute
Julian Alvarez scored the opening goal in the 1st half
Pre-Game Insights: Argentina had gone three games at the tournament without finding the back of the net, including a failed Panenka in a penalty shootout against Ecuador in the quarterfinal
Post-Match Reflections: Jesse Marsch said he was proud of his team and that they had built a good foundation for the future
Argentina coach Lionel Scaloni will face the winner of Uruguay vs. Colombia in the final on Sunday, July 14
Miscellaneous Highlights: Canada will face either Uruguay vs. Colombia on Saturday, July 13 at 8:00 p.m. ET for the third-place game
Argentina had threatened just once or twice before scoring the opening goal
